metadata.name: PsExec Service File Creation
metadata.comment: Detects default PsExec service filename which indicates PsExec service installation and execution

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\psexesvc.exe')))

output.summary: Detects default PsExec service filename which indicates PsExec service installation and execution
